award_title: CAREER: Microstructural Influences on the Diffusion Paths Controlling Nucleation and Growth of the Grain Boundary Precipitates Responsible for Sensitization in Al-Mg Alloys
subject: Re: analysis code that only runs on your machine
body:
Image analysis pipelines for characterization data are impossible to share well. Too custom, too many dependencies, outputs too big for SI.

I built Ouro as a thin API over computational workflowsâ€”lets other researchers rerun your methods directly instead of reimplementing from the paper. Makes NSF's accessibility expectations actually manageable.

Quick demo after holidays if you're curious?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
